title: The Fantasy League Murders & The Bolivian Soldier Double Feature
description: The Fantasy League Murders When private investigator Paul Finley is hired to find a missing teenager who turns up dead, he comes up against the powers-that-be in a rich Long Island community who have a problem distinguishing sex and murder from their fantasy baseball games. The Bolivian Sailor A newly-arrived Bolivian seaman is found murdered in a New York roach motel. An address book found on his body lists private investigator Paul Finley as one of only three American contacts. Finley's first problem is that he doesn't know any Bolivians; his second is that the other two people in the address book have also turned up dead.
author: Donald Dewey
